StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMoralO.ense]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectID uniqueiden..er =NULL, @MoralO.enseID uniqueiden..er = NULL, @LegalO.enseTypeID int = NULL, @LegalO.enseID int = NULL
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT ProspectLegalO.enseId ,ProspectId ,LegalO.enseDate ,LegalO.enseCity ,CityName = CASE LegalO.enseCountry WHEN 'US' THEN (SELECT top (1) Name FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCi.es WHERE Code=LegalO.enseCity AND StateCode = LegalO.enseState AND CountyCode = LegalO.enseCounty) ELSE (SELECT top (1) Name FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCi.es WHERE Code=LegalO.enseCity AND StateCode = LegalO.enseCountry) END ,LegalO.enseCounty ,(SELECT top (1) Name FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCoun.es WHERE StateCode = LegalO.enseState AND Code = LegalO.enseCounty) AS CountyName ,LegalO.enseState ,(SELECT top (1) Name FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwStatesWithTerritories WHERE Code = LegalO.enseState) AS StateName ,LegalO.enseId ,(SELECT Descrip.on FROM MCRISS.USMC.LegalO.ense lo WHERE lo.LegalO.enseId = plo.LegalO.enseId AND lo.LegalO.enseTypeId = plo.LegalO.enseTypeId ) AS O.enseDescrip.on ,IsGuilty ,IsJuvenile ,Disposi.on ,Detail ,LegalO.enseCountry ,(SELECT top (1) Name FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCountries WHERE Code = LegalO.enseCountry) AS CountryName ,LegalO.enseTypeId ,(SELECT Descrip.on FROM MCRISS.USMC.LegalO.enseType t WHERE t.LegalO.enseTypeId = plo.LegalO.enseTypeId) AS O.enseType ,ZipCode FROM USMC.ProspectLegalO.ense plo WHERE (@ProspectID IS NULL OR ProspectId = @ProspectID) AND (@MoralO.enseID IS NULL OR ProspectLegalO.enseId = @MoralO.enseID) AND (@LegalO.enseTypeID IS NULL OR LegalO.enseTypeId = @LegalO.enseTypeID) AND (@LegalO.enseID IS NULL OR LegalO.enseId = @LegalO.enseID) END
